name: planit-food
description: An app to manage the weekly food shop

scripts.clean-build: rimraf node_modules/ && npm i && cd /client && rimraf node_modules/ && npm i && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: cd client/ && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run build:client && npm run start:server

author: Dave Ogle <davidogle85@gmail.com>
